com.quantcomponents.algo
Interface IManagedRunnable

All Superinterfaces:
Runnable
All Known Subinterfaces:
ITradingAgent, ITradingAgentExecution
All Known Implementing Classes:
AverageCrossingTradingAgent, DummyTradingAgentExecution
public interface IManagedRunnable
extends Runnable

Parent interface of processors that run in another thread. This interface gives the caller the ability to interact with the execution of the processor. Since this interface extends Runnable, it gives the caller the choice of synchronous or asynchronous execution. The other interface methods are useful in case of asynchronous execution. All implementors must be thread safe.
